400.title: Bad Request
400.explanation: The request sent to the server could not be understood due to malformed syntax. This is likely not your fault if you’re reading this, but rather the programmer that coded the program you’re using.

401.title: Unauthorized
401.explanation: You need to authenticate to view this page.

403.title: Forbidden
403.explanation: You are not allowed to access this page.

404.title: Not Found
404.explanation: The server cannot find the page you requested. This might be due to an error in the URI for this page, or due to the document being moved or for other reasons no longer available.

410.title: Gone
410.explanation: The page you were trying to view is no longer available at this address, and will not return.

500.title: Internal Server Error
500.explanation: The web server encountred an error while trying to generate the page you requested. This is likely not your fault, and once the responsible persons get their act together, this page should return.

502.title: Bad Gateway
502.explanation: Another server was responsible for fulfilling this request. Alas, it let us all down. Our sincere apologies. This is likely not your fault, and once the responsible persons get their act together, this page should return.
